tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE viewer_behavior_analysis (
    viewer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id UUID,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    duration_seconds INT
)

CREATE TABLE viewers (viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  country_code VARCHAR(3))

CREATE TABLE viewer_actions (action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  viewer_id INT,
  action_type VARCHAR(20),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS viewers (viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, viewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, join_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS videos (video_id INT PRIMARY KEY, video_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, upload_date DATE NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS view_history (view_id INT PRIMARY KEY, viewer_id INT NOT NULL, video_id INT NOT NULL, watch_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS recommendations (recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, viewer_id INT NOT NULL, recommended_video_id INT NOT NULL, recommendation_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE videos (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    video_title VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT,
    video_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);
